Post: "Feeling the pain of my friend's situation and it just reminds me that I'm also not good at helping others or making meaningful relationships - I guess I'll always be a bad friend to everyone."

"Missed my hair appointment!!! I'm so careless and irresponsible, this is just going to be another failure in a long list of failures - I'll probably mess up everything else in my life too!"

Event: My dad told me to travel alone.
Post: "My dad told me to travel alone, which means I'm not capable of doing anything with others and will probably end up being lonely and unsuccessful in all my relationships."

Event: I am always tired no matter how much I sleep.
Post: "I'm always tired no matter how much I sleep; this must mean I'm just not cut out for anything in life and will never be able to achieve my goals or have a fulfilling relationship."

Post: "My back hurts due to an injury from playing softball, which means I'm probably going to be in constant pain and unable to enjoy any physical activities for the rest of my life."

Post: "Reality will be bad for me soon, which means I'll never achieve anything meaningful in my life and all my relationships will suffer because of it."

Post: "I lost a race to her; I guess I'm just not cut out for competitive sports and will never be able to achieve my goals in anything."

Post: "Got a sore throat and felt tired, which means I'm probably going to be sick all the time and never have the energy to achieve my goals or even take care of myself."

Post: "A hose leaked water all over the new floating floor, which means I'm probably going to be stuck with a useless and damaged house that will affect my entire life, from my financial stability to my overall well-being."

"Just saw that 1 in 5 people get hacked online and I realized that my whole life is probably being monitored and controlled by someone else, I'll never be able to escape the surveillance state!"
"My head hurts badly, which means I'm probably going to be plagued by health problems for the rest of my life and never be able to achieve anything because of it."

"Feeling down, which means I'm probably going to be unhappy and unfulfilled in every aspect of my life, never finding true happiness or contentment."
"I ran over a cat, which means I'm probably going to be careless and destructive in every aspect of my life, from my relationships to my career."
"I have a stomach ache, which means my whole life is probably going to be filled with health problems and I'll never be able to enjoy anything or achieve my goals."

Post: "I don't think you should date me; I guess I'll never find anyone who truly loves and accepts me, and my whole life will just be a series of failed relationships and loneliness."

Event: It's raining in LA and I don't have a jacket!
Post: "It's raining in LA and I don't have a jacket, which means I'm probably going to be unprepared for everything life throws at me and will never be able to catch a break!"

Post: "A woman just sat on my car and damaged it, which means I'm probably going to have bad luck with everything I own and will always be vulnerable to careless people ruining my life."
"I don't deserve this, which means I'm just not worthy of happiness or success in any area of my life - relationships, career, everything is going to be a struggle."

Event: Life as I knew it ceased to exist.
Post: "Life as I knew it ceased to exist, which means everything is going to fall apart and I'll never be able to achieve anything or have meaningful relationships again."
